channel.title: Updates on edelgrace.me
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on edelgrace.me

item.title: Here We Go
item.description: There’s nothing like starting a new website on the first day of a month, halfway through the semester, and with my very first responsive design. I’m excited that I’m (silently) opening this website but I also have this nagging feeling at the back of my mind. I need to close a few other chapters in my online life. I have two domains that I will be letting go. One is my current blog and the other was a failed project blog of mine.
